alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 2:33AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HEAT INDEX VALUES BETWEEN 105 AND 109 DEGREES ARE EXPECTED THIS AFTERNOON OVER THE NORTHERN COASTAL BEND... The combination of warm temperatures and high dewpoints will produce heat indices between 105 and 109 degrees this afternoon over the northern Coastal Bend. Residents with outdoor activities planned are urged to drink plenty of water, wear light weight and light colored clothing and take frequent breaks from the heat. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio
